info.name: Exponent Box
info.description: The power series in a cube.

renderpass.code:
#define rt(a) mat2(cos(m.a+vec4(0,11,33,0))) // rotate
void mainImage(out vec4 C, in vec2 U)
{
    float t = iTime/5.;
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,
         m = (iMouse.xy/R*4.)-2.;
    vec3 u = vec3((U-.5*R)/R.y, .5); // coords
    if (iMouse.z < 1.) m = vec2(sin(t/2.)*.4, sin(t)*.2); // camera sway
    u.yz *= rt(y); // pitch
    u.xz *= rt(x); // yaw
    u /= u.yzx; // quotient transform
    u = log(abs(u.yzx))/log(abs(u)); // exponent transform
    vec3 c = (max(vec3(0), 1.-(abs(fract(u+.5)-.5)/fwidth(u)/1.5)) // grid lines
       + (1.-abs(sin(u*3.1416)))*.6) // line glow
       * min(vec3(1), 1./abs(u)); // darken
    C = vec4(c*.5+c*c, 1);
}
